description:
Nagumo Keiichiro was once a great child detective, but age is starting to catch up with him.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Former Great Detective Nagumo Keiichiro / Mashiro`s Pest Extermination
Kêichirô Nagumo, ancien grand détective / Mashiro, la reine de la désinsectisation
Moto Meitantei: Nagumo Keiichirou / Mashiro no Gaichuu Taiji
元名探偵 名雲桂一郎 / 真白の害虫退治
